column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: A Chinese man was detained by police after being caught by a mob in the vicinity of  Independence Monument of Sihanoukville at 8 pm on May 28
column5: the suspect grabbed a bag from another Chinese when the victim had opened the door of their car.------The unnamed suspect was taken to the provincial police commission for further action.------ ------http://www.phnompenhreporter.com/article/81851
